title: Angular documentation localization guidelines
contents:
mode_edit

Angular 文档本地化指南link

Angular documentation localization guidelineslink

为 Angular 文档做贡献的一种方法是将其本地化为另一种语言。本主题介绍了为了对 Angular 进行本地化并将其列在我们的本地化文档页面上，你需要了解的知识。

One way to contribute to Angular's documentation is to localize it into another language. This topic describes what you need to know to localize Angular and have it listed on our Localized documentation page.

在你开始之前link

Before you beginlink

在开始本地化 Angular 文档之前，请首先检查是否已经存在本地化版本。有关 Angular 文档的本地化版本的当前列表，请参阅本地化文档。

Before you start localizing the Angular documentation, first check to see if a localized version already exists. See Localized documentation for a current list of localized versions of Angular documentation.

快速上手link

Getting startedlink

要在angular.io上列出本地化版本的 Angular 文档，你必须：

To have a localized version of Angular documentation listed on angular.io, you must either:

  • 成为 Angular Google 开发人员专家 (GDE)

    Be an Angular Google Developer Expert (GDE)

  • 让 Angular GDE 提名你对内容进行本地化

    Have an Angular GDE nominate you for localizing the content

在这种情况下，提名意味着 GDE 知道你是谁，并且可以保证你的能力。Angular GDE 可以通过联系 Angular 团队、提供你的姓名、联系信息和你要本地化的语言来提名某人。

Nomination, in this instance, means that the GDE knows who you are and can vouch for your capabilities. An Angular GDE can nominate someone by contacting the Angular team, providing your name, contact information, and the language to which you are localizing.

要本地化什么link

What to localizelink

要本地化 Angular 文档，你必须至少包含以下主题：

To localize Angular documentation, you must include, at a minimum, the following topics:

  • Angular 文档介绍

    Introduction to the Angular docs

  • 什么是 Angular？

    What is Angular?

  • Angular 入门

    Getting started with Angular

    • 添加导航

      Adding navigation

    • 管理数据

      Managing data

    • 使用表单进行用户输入

      Using forms for user input

    • 部署应用程序

      Deploying an application

    • 设置本地环境和工作区

      Setting up the local environment and workspace

  • 英雄之旅应用程序和教程

    Tour of Heroes app and tutorial

    • 创建一个新项目

      Create a new project

    • 英雄编辑

      The hero editor

    • 显示选择列表

      Display a selection list

    • 创建特性组件

      Create a feature component

    • 添加服务

      Add services

    • 使用路由添加导航

      Add navigation with routing

    • 从服务器获取数据

      Get data from a server

因为这些主题反映了为本地化设置的最少文档，所以 Angular 文档团队在对这些主题进行任何更改时会采取特殊的预防措施。具体来说：

Because these topics reflect the minimum documentation set for localization, the Angular documentation team takes special precautions when making any changes to these topics. Specifically:

  • Angular 团队会仔细评估任何传入的 Pull Request 或问题，以确定它们对本地化内容的影响。

    The Angular team carefully assesses any incoming pull requests or issues to determine their impact on localized content.

  • 如果 Angular 团队将更改合并到这些主题中，则 Angular 团队将把这些更改传达给本地化社区的成员。有关更多信息，请参阅通信部分。

    If the Angular team incorporates changes into these topics, the Angular team will communicate those changes to members of the localization community. See the section, Communications, for more information.

托管link

Hostinglink

将 Angular 文档本地化的个人和团队负责托管他们的本地化网站。Angular 团队不托管本地化内容。Angular 团队也不负责提供域名。

Individuals and teams that localize Angular documentation assume responsibility for hosting their localized site. The Angular team does not host localized content. The Angular team is also not responsible for providing domain names.

意识link

Awarenesslink

作为本地化工作的一部分，Angular 文档团队将本地化文档添加到本地化文档页面。本主题列出了：

As part of the localization effort, the Angular documentation team adds localized documentation to the Localized documentation page. This topic lists:

  • 本地化文档的语言

    The language of the localized documentation

  • 本地化文档的 URL

    The URL for the localized documentation

Angular 团队可以出于任何原因删除此页面上的链接，包括但不限于：

The Angular team can remove a link on this page for any reason, including but not limited to:

  • 无法联系个人或团队

    Inability to contact the individual or team

  • 有关未解决的文档的问题或投诉

    Issues or complaints about the documentation that go unaddressed

通讯link

Communicationslink

Angular 文档团队使用 Slack 频道与专注于本地化工作的社区成员进行沟通。在收到内容本地化的提名后，个人或团队可以联系 Angular 团队以访问此 Slack 频道。

The Angular documentation team uses a Slack channel to communicate with members of the community focused on localization efforts. After receiving a nomination to localize content, an individual or team can contact the Angular team to get access to this Slack channel.

Angular 文档团队也可能会召开会议来讨论本地化工作。例如：

The Angular documentation team may also conduct meetings to discuss localization efforts. For example:

  • 讨论应该作为最低文档集一部分的其他主题

    To discuss additional topics that should be part of the minimum documentation set

  • 讨论使用难以翻译/本地化的内容语言的问题

    To discuss issues with content language that is difficult to translate/localize

最后复查时间： 2/28/2022
